sentences.sContent: We find that both ofcompanies are overvalued at the time of merger, and the America Online are moreovervalued than the Time Warner.
sentences.sContent_eng: We find that both ofcompanies are overvalued at the time of merger, and the America Online are moreovervalued than the Time Warner.
sentences.sCn: 通过分析我们发现并购中双方公司的价值在并购之前都被高估了；而美国在线的被高估程度更为严重。

sentences.sContent: The cost of borrowing abroad is likely to rise , the overvalued kenyan shilling will fall , tourism has already been badly hit and foreign aid may be cut back.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cost of borrowing abroad is likely to rise , the overvalued kenyan shilling will fall , tourism has already been badly hit and foreign aid may be cut back.
sentences.sCn: 从国外的贷款有可能会上升，而估价过高的肯尼亚先令也将贬值，旅游业已经受到重挫，国外援助可能也会减少。

trans.tranCn: 定价过高的， 估价过高的
